articles.title: Kentucky floods kill at least 16 as governor warns toll will be "a lot higher"
articles.description: At least 16 people have died as rains unleashed what Kentucky Gov. Andy Beshear described as some of the worst flooding in the state's history.

articles.title: Pelosi departing for Asia on Friday, but Taiwan stop still uncertain
